firebase.name: firebase
firebase.description: A Model Context Protocol server for Firebase CLI tools, enabling AI assistants to interact with Firebase services including hosting, functions, database, authentication, and more.

npm.description: Run Firebase CLI with experimental MCP support

examples.title: Initialize Firebase Project
examples.description: Initialize a new Firebase project in the current directory
examples.prompt: Initialize a new Firebase project with hosting and functions

examples.title: Deploy to Firebase
examples.description: Deploy your project to Firebase hosting and functions
examples.prompt: Deploy my current project to Firebase

examples.title: List Firebase Projects
examples.description: Show all Firebase projects associated with your account

examples.title: Check Firebase Status
examples.description: Check the status of Firebase services
examples.prompt: Check the current status of my Firebase project

examples.title: Manage Firebase Functions
examples.description: Deploy or manage Firebase Cloud Functions

examples.title: Firebase Database Operations
examples.description: Interact with Firestore or Realtime Database
examples.prompt: Show me the structure of my Firestore database

examples.title: Firebase Hosting
examples.description: Manage Firebase hosting configuration and deployment
examples.prompt: Deploy my website to Firebase hosting

examples.title: Authentication Setup
examples.prompt: Set up Firebase Authentication for my project

setup_instructions: Run 'npx -y firebase-tools@latest login --reauth' to authenticate with your Google account
Ensure you have the necessary Firebase project permissions
Configure your project using 'firebase init' if not already done

context7.name: context7
context7.description: A Model Context Protocol server for Context7, enabling AI assistants to interact with advanced context management and semantic search capabilities.

examples.title: Initialize Context7
examples.description: Set up Context7 for your project
examples.prompt: Initialize Context7 for managing my project context

examples.title: Add Context
examples.description: Add new context or documents to Context7
examples.prompt: Add this document to my Context7 knowledge base

examples.title: Search Context
examples.prompt: Search my Context7 for information about authentication

examples.title: Manage Collections
examples.prompt: Create a new collection in Context7 for my project documentation

setup_instructions: Set up your Context7 project configuration
Ensure you have the necessary API keys configured

ahrefs.name: ahrefs
ahrefs.description: Ahrefs Model Context Protocol Server for SEO and backlink analysis.

API_KEY.description: Ahrefs API key for authenticating with the Ahrefs API
